#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

typedef long long int ll;

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int f,h,w;
		cin>>f>>h>>w;
		vector<int>pos;
		for(int i=0;i<f;i++)
		{
			int l;
			cin>>l;
			pos.push_back(l);
		}
		int area = h * w;
		sort(pos.begin(),pos.end());
		int min = pos[0];
		pos[f] = w;
		for(int i=1;i<=f;i++)
		{
			if(min>pos[i]-pos[i-1])
				min=pos[i]-pos[i-1]; 
		}
		min = min * h;
		cout<<min<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
